item.description: Looks like my RSS reader is becoming an RSS and Atom reader because Github insists on using Atom and I'd like to follow some projects in this way

Been working on an RSS reader as of late called Kisserss, a Keep it Simple Stupid RSS client with a TUI interface (to be created), as part of this I wrote a completely custom xml tokenizer because I do infact hate myself and wanted that as a challenge (this was during a time I had no main PC just a terrible 12 year old laptop and no internet connection), the reading of the RSS feed is done pretty much, just need to do the UI, and maybe a teeny bit (a lot) of refactoring

media:content.media:description: On the left the parsed RSS feed produced by the program. On the right is the raw XML for the RSS feed.

item.description: It's baffling to me that people still use the official Mastodon app, even accessing your favourite instance in the browser is preferable over that
Seeing lots of london pride pics on here, I hope everyone has had or having a great day, really wish I could have gone, but university deadlines suck

Good Morning all you lovely beings
I hope you all have a wonderful day

I've been on this massive change lately, going to bed at midnight, waking up at 8AM, going on long walks on a whim not wearing too many layers or hoodies, putting my hair up and looking as femme as I can without being obvious, it's such a massive change and I am loving it, this week is gonna be cleanup of my room, getting rid of dumb crap I've just not had the energy to do ever and maybe another extra long walk
Tropical storm weather outside right now, I'm living for it

Local tesco's be like: "Celebrate Pride with Brewdog Pride beer"
Meanwhile outside: Salvation Army donation bins
Pick a side dumbasses

mh-

Starting to wonder and get concerned that like my friends are resetting? like everyone is gonna go away and I'll have to somehow find new ones or just be extremely lonely

selfie | eye contact

Tried a ponytail to the side the other day and I absolutely love how femme it makes me look and feel

media:content.media:description: Selfie of me with my hair in a ponytail and coming around the side over my shoulder

item.description:
I need to clean up this project at some point and upload it somewhere.
It's a parser for cellular automata rules written in Rust that compiles to WASM that also renders it to a HTML table.

The rules for wireworld are described as so:
black,blue,red,yellow
0,1,2,3
3 > 1,1 > 1
3 > 1 > 1
1 > > 2
2 > > 3
0 > > 0
Where the first line is the colours of the cells, it uses css colours so names are fine aslong as they are valid, the next row is the cell id's that exist and relate to each colour in order.
The proceeding rows are the rules
where `3 > 1,1 > 1` means that a cell with ID 3, when adjacent to 2 cells with ID 1, will become a cell with ID 1.
It is then duplicated for the fact that when adjacent to 1 cell of ID 1 also does the same thing.
Rules with a blank mean that it just converts on the next step regardless

media:content.media:description: An example of the Cellular Automata Wireworld with options to Pause and Step aswell as buttons for selecting the cells to draw onto the grid

item.description: Reaquired some of my love for photography lately, saw these leaves shining beautifully under the street light earlier and just had to grab a photo

Been experimenting a lot with Origin Private File System (OPFS) recently, just to see what it's capable of and if it can provide a decent virtual file system for in browser and I must say it's quite nice if a little difficult to navigate with the small amount of methods available.
Also hoping browsers add a new menu to their developer tools to enable exploring it without having to access it via script in console.
Logged into GTA Online earlier, not entirely sure why, but it's good to know that it's still plagued with hackers trying to get other people banned

Mh-

I'm just so fucked, ever since that uni assignment last thursday where I was living off coffee and naps for about a week trying to get it done, I've just not been able to sleep properly or relax ever since.
I just got stabbed in my dream by a bunch of teenagers while my family walked on ahead..
This is the most I ever want to be involved in a minecraft spigot plugin ðŸ˜‚

media:content.media:description: An image of the minecraft spigot plugin QuickShop's update changelog. Highlighting a contribution I made to add finding the enchants on enchanted books with a command.

item.description:
Mh- | stress

Those dreams made me feel like absolute shit, being a total fuck up with uni stuff in the first and then being back at school and being bullied in class in the second, I really don't want to be awake today but I have so much to do with 0 guidance or support

After quite a few weeks of work and late nights, my friend @codie has managed to get a Proof of Concept for the Xbox Xenia emulator doing netplay on Halo 3.
Happy to have been able to help by being the second client they attempted to connect and really bad at playing games with a controller (I am the other player in the video)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=amS8OxH3exs

Original Tweet:
https://twitter.com/craftycodie/status/1626868414617722883?s=20
Now that I look at Storj, I hope we can stop using it, using something that relies on blockchain and crypto currency is not a great idea for this sort of thing..
